Transposition / turning may be related to letter 𓏏:

The mirrored version of air 𓇯 is earth 󴃙 = 𓇯𓏏 (Gardiner #N50, 0xF40D9)

see 𓊛 vs 𓊜 back barkasse

turned ≠ gunu
